title: Resurfaced
description: In an underwater empire ruled by a vengeful king and populated by a race filled with hatred for all things human, can Kailani survive long enough to rescue her parents and escape the city?With unlikely allies by her side, Kai fights to survive. To return to land with both her parents. To return to the loving arms of her soul mate. Resurfaced is the follow-up to Suppressed, and continues Kai and Bryceâ€™s story. Filled with action, magic and romance, lovers of The Little Mermaid and Beautiful Creatures will enjoy this series.
author: Wendi L. Wilson
